name: Who Wants The Grail
description:
DESCRIPTION:

       WWTG is a game in which two players fight to the death in a stunning map through four seasons and three epic tournaments. The game play is simple, brutal and effective one hit kills. Many secrets and other quests are waiting for you in this amazing adventure, will you be able to discover them all?

      Each player only gets three lives. You can find the lady of the lake to get Excalibur, hide yourself in a castle, close the draw bridge and then use a trebuchet to kill the other player. Feeling more like a wizard? Get the power of magic and cast a spell. Do you want to verse in each other in the tournament? Go see the king and then fight on a horse, be the last to stay alive while you verse waves of guards or a singular combat with your sword against the other player.

FEATURES:

  • Multiplayer combat

  • Dynamic interactive map

  • Tournament mini games

  • Powerful trebuchet

  • Interactive castle

  • Quest to upgrade your weapon

  • Original soundtrack

  • A lot of different gory ways to die

BIOGRAPHY:

My name is Brian Rochat (Bry55) I am currently studying at Media Design School in New Zealand. I am doing the Bachelor of Creative Technologies Game Art. Who Wants The Grail is my first game that I released. I have other games planned for the future.
